title: . Only one weight appears into Adobe® Illustrator®
content:
Hello -

I try to add some characters (with FontLab®) into an existing .TTF font (eg. "çÇ", …). In fact it's a font with many separated weight (each weight is a .TTF file)  
When I export each file (after formated it as OTF table) everything goes well.  
But, when All the fonts are installed, well only see one of them into Adobe® Illustrator® font menu.

How is that possible?

NB. I checked all the fonts with FontDoctor®, and No font problems were diagnosed!  
Thank you, have a nice day…

- Dimitri [http://www.thebend.be/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131659/http:/www.thebend.be/ "http://www.thebend.be/")
author: dimitri_c

comments.content:
Hi Dimitri, I think your request could get better/faster answers in the [Build-board](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131659/http:/typophile.com/forum/6). Good luck.

For the others: [Sample of the problem](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019131659/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/forum/thread/35058).
